channel.title: Advertising
channel.description:
What're some good ways to advertise an RSPS. We have $75 or so that can be attributed solely to advertising, but we are stumped as to what exactly we should do. So, anyone with any information regarding this, please post here. We're really trying to get the server off the ground.
Please don't post about there being an advertising thread and a Server Status page. We obviously use both of those.

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Your server is still new, I’d save the cash personally until you can afford an advertisement on Mopar ( so about 250-300$)

Until you reach your first month or so you don’t want to go into the negatives from back charges

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Ask your members to tell friends about the server, tell your friends about the server. Use other free advertising options.

Read full topic
